_comment: English translation file (en). Structured by sections: models (data models) and ui (user interface).

validations.microchip_format: Microchip must contain up to 15 digits.
validations.species_invalid: Species must be one of the following: Dog, Cat, Bird, Rodent, or Other.

fields.how_did_you_know: How Did You Hear About Us

validations.cpf_required: CPF is required when Has CPF is Yes.
validations.passport_required: Passport number is required when Has CPF is No.
validations.special_needs_details_required: Special needs details are required when Has Special Needs is Yes.

descriptions.vaccinationCard: Document that proves the animal's vaccination containing information such as vaccines administered, dates, and responsible veterinarian.
descriptions.microchipCertificate: Declaration that proves the implantation of the identification microchip in the pet, containing the number and information about the application.
descriptions.rabiesSerologyReport: Laboratory test that attests to the presence of antibodies against the rabies virus, commonly required for international travel.
descriptions.leishmaniasisSerologyReport: Test that demonstrates non-infection by leishmaniasis or low incidence, depending on the requirements of the destination country.
descriptions.importPermit: Official authorization issued by the destination country allowing the entry of the animal.
descriptions.petPassport: International document that records the identity, vaccines, and health history of the animal for travel abroad.
descriptions.cvi: International Veterinary Certificate issued by the official veterinarian of the country of origin, attesting to the health of the pet.
descriptions.importAuthorization: Document that proves official permission to import the animal, issued by the competent authority.
descriptions.arrivalNotice: Notification to authorities about the arrival of the pet, mandatory in some destinations.
descriptions.endorsedCvi: International Veterinary Certificate that has received endorsement from the competent health authorities.
descriptions.awbCargo: Air Waybill: air shipping document that accompanies cargo, including animals, containing transport details.
descriptions.petFacilities: Document that describes the facilities or accommodations planned for the pet before/during travel.
descriptions.otherPetDocuments: Any other relevant document that does not fall into the above categories.

descriptions.identityDocument: Official photo identification document (ID card, driver's license, or similar).
descriptions.cviIssuanceAuthorization: Term that authorizes the issuance of the International Veterinary Certificate on behalf of the owner or guardian.
descriptions.passport: Traveler's passport, required for international travel.
descriptions.travelTicket: Air, road, or rail passenger ticket.
descriptions.travelAuthorization: Travel authorization, usually required when there are unaccompanied minors or specific legal requirements.
descriptions.carDocument: Vehicle document, if it is part of the trip (e.g., registration certificate).
descriptions.addressProof: Document that proves residential address (utility bill, etc.).
descriptions.otherHumanDocuments: Any other document that does not fall into the above categories.

descriptions.origin: City and country where the journey starts, following airline standardization.
descriptions.destination: City and country of destination, following airline standardization.
descriptions.travelTicketFile: File containing the ticket (can be PDF or image).
descriptions.travelTicketDate: Exact date and time referring to the purchased ticket.
descriptions.estimatedDate: Approximate date or forecast of boarding (year and month).
descriptions.travelingPets: Identifiers of pets that will travel (can be an index or ID generated internally).
descriptions.destinationAddress: Complete address where the pet/person will stay or reside at the destination.
descriptions.travelMethod: Form of transport used (e.g., Airplane, Bus, Own Vehicle, Petransport).
descriptions.borderCity: Border city in land or mixed travels, if applicable.
descriptions.vehiclePlate: License plate of the vehicle used in the trip (up to 7 digits).

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.form_invalid: Please correct the errors in the form.
errors.file_size: File is too large. Maximum size: 5MB.
errors.file_type: File type not allowed. Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF.
errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalid_date_format: Please enter a valid date in DD/MM/YYYY format
errors.future_date: The date cannot be in the future
errors.weight_range: Weight must be between 0 and 100 kg
errors.invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.invalid_cpf: Please enter a valid CPF (11 digits)

confirmations.delete_pet: Are you sure you want to delete this pet?
confirmations.delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

placeholders.search_user: Search by name, email or username...

help_texts.photo: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF. Maximum size: 5MB

owner_registration.title: Owner Registration
owner_registration.use_different_address: Use a different address for delivery
owner_registration.for_disabled: For assistance to people with disabilities
owner_registration.accepted_formats: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF. Maximum size: 5MB
